sense.def:
To whistle
pomeni ustvariti zvok tako, da pihnemo skozi ustnice.

seg.quote: I was whistling little bits of the song.
Sean let out a low whistle of surprise.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
whistles
, ustvari glasen, visok zvok.

seg.quote: The bullets whistled past his head.
The train whistled as it approached the tunnel.

sense.def:
A whistle
je majhna kovinska cev, v katero pihamo, da nastane glasen zvok in pritegnemo pozornost ljudi.

seg.quote: The guard blew his whistle and waved his green flag.
